All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Boat
This object is used to collapse all the boat informations into it.
Client
This class is the one which is started in order to open a client instance.
ClientHandler
This class manages the messages received by the client and redirects them to the server calling a precise method.
Controller_AddBoat
This class contains all the method used inside the AddBoat GUI, when all the boat information are added by the user and the "SUBMIT" button is pressed, it will redirect the user to the Pay GUI in which the payment must be satisfied in order to successfully add the boat to the Database.
Controller_History
This class contains all the method useful to show all the payment history, when the page is open a tableview is filled with all the past payments completed.
Controller_LogIN
This class is the first that appears when the client is started; it shows all the fields in order to allow the user or manager to log in the system.
Controller_Manager
This class has the purpose to manage the Manager GUI, it populates the tableview and allows the manager to delete or add a competition.
Controller_Notification
This class has the purpose to manage the Notification GUI, it populates a tableview whether if the Notification database table has some row.
Controller_Partner
This class is the most important, it contains all the logic in the user homepage.
Controller_Pay
This class has the purpose to manage all the payment page and is called whenever a payment needs to be done.
Controller_PaymentHistory
This class has the purpose to populate the Payment History GUI.
Controller_SignUp
This class has the purpose to show all the option needed to add a new user.
Main
This class is the Main one, from which the all program gui starts.
Message
Object used, sometimes, to send a message via an object.
Notification
This object contains all the information needed to properly show a notification with all the needed details.
Participant
This object contains all the needed information in order to complete a competition or a boat subscription.
PayIstance
This object is needed to represent a single payment done with all the details.
PaymentMethod
This object is used to contain all the information of a single Payment Method.
Person
This object contains all the personal informations of a single user or manager.
Server
This class represents the server which contains all the methods that can be called by the clientHandler (via the Client).
